title: Exploring the Relationship between Social Capital and Individual Learning: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Sociological Theories, Network Analysis Understanding, and Basic Quantitative Research Methodology
context.additional_context: Learners acquire methods to analyze personal learning experiences in relation to social network structures and conduct empirical research using real-world data.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of structural characteristics of social capital (network density, structural holes, etc.) on individual learning.
Learners can visualize and interpret their own networks using social network analysis tools.
Learners can empirically demonstrate the relationship between social capital and learning outcomes through survey design and data collection.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
